roleset.name: to assume, take for granted

roles.note: arg0 may be realized as a presumptuous action with adjectival rel 'presumptuous'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: As it stands now , Congress presumes after the Reagan administration that the White House will take unconstitutional provisions in appropriations bills [*-1] lying down .
example.arg: the White House will take unconstitutional provisions in appropriations bills [*-1] lying down

example.name: raising
example.text: Company officials said [0] 22 workers were missing and presumed dead .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'presume' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus; adjectival 'presumptuous' based on BOLT-6.

example.name: adjectival rel: presumptuous
example.text: Of course it is a little farfetched and presumptuous to say so , and also to praises the thief .
